title: Declare your allegiance to Baron Nashor

replies.body: I declared my undying allegiance to Santa Baron long ago sir.
Santa Baron shall forever rule the rift.
Santa Baron Masterrace
Santa Baron - Only Baron
Santa Baron is Love, Santa Baron is Life.
So much Santa...
Santa Baron Powers Activate!
AH! My Santa Baron Brothers! <3
One for all and all for Santa Baron!
I know right.
I wanted so bad that santa baron {{item:3070}}
It's all Snover now.
Logged in just to up-vote this terrible pun! Because I love puns. To the {{champion:112}} go the spoils.
{{champion:33}} ok
{{champion:33}} ok
can I have my virus in lime green?
Can anyone clarify if this is legit or not please.
.....it's not.

I prefer using my IP for these things, not my RP.

I'd rather buy Annie with my RP than this sad offering.

Santa Baron is THE only icon you need.
Yea well not everyone was non-toxic. Not everyone gets santa baron.
what is your deal man?
He's upset he didn't get Santa Baron.
He's Jelly, Mac
Who is this wannabe Baron Nashor? He doesnt even have a hat!
Why exactly cant this be purchased using IP?
Most icons aren't. The ones that are are usually 1 IP, and in my experience at least, not publicly announced, so you just gotta check the store every few days...

I don't quite understand why everyone seems so angry that this icon costs RP. It's only 250... the same as every other icon they've released (minus the ones you earn for playing featured gamemodes, ect.) 

An icon really isn't that big of a deal. It's not like they released a new champion that you had to pay for. If you don't like the icon, then don't pay for it. You don't need to complain to Riot for not giving you **even more free stuff than they already do**
Finally. Someone with logic who also respects Riot for all the good things they give us. And that's coming from a guy who was prevented from playing URF this year.
there needs to be a baron ward skin rito. it would be amazing to place a ward and see a mini baron.
Now this idea would be worth RP. 10/10 would purchase.
why don't they just make an icon with dollar signs, telling everyone you have money to blow
isnt that what we bought? rich icon masterrace
i think vilemaw needs some love too........

What the actual f..k Riot? Are you freaking serious? Why charge RP for this Icon? You guys already printing money from Chromas and new skins. Let us buy this Icon with IP...

SMH RIOT.

> Chromas

Riot has nothing to do with CS:GO

Edit: The brand new thing, I am stupid. Sorry
What is Baron like what kind of creature is it? Is it a worm, is it a thing, what kind of creature? WE NEED BACK STORY NOW!!!

Gonna have to say, not really worth the RP cost, RIOT. Many, many players already have the Santa Baron (myself included) so to spend RP on something that we basically already have (if not a little bit sillier) is just a plain bad idea. It makes no sense from a business standpoint. While the Baron Nashor may be one of the most iconic beasts of the game, unless you make this icon do more than look cool--which, in your defense, it does--you probably won't see too much of your user-base spending RP to get it.

tl;dr: I love you guys, RIOT. But making it cost RP is a bad idea.

Well, many people who were on back then, yes, but I didn't join League until August 2014, so I never had that chance...Plus, this icon features the new three-mouthed (headed?) Baron, while Santa Baron is the old many-eyed one. Not that I have a problem with the old Baron, but this icon may just be for the relatively new players or just as something a little more up-to-date.

I wouldn't mind IP icons myself, but...I'm not really expecting that to become a regular thing any time soon.
But which Baron Nashor?  The one that looms over the rift in the top side river or his brother that lurks underground?
Everyone is all on about how the santa baron is the best but im over here rockin the wrapped poro because wrapped poro is cutest poro. Come on guys... lets be real.
I swear solemnly that I will live and die by the Gromp!
I already have a gold covered spatchula.

That's all you need, really.
I already have Diana's Moon Blade.  It's all I need.
Even Riot admits they don't know what the Baron is ;o
Now all we need is a Gromp icon.
Make a Gromp icon, so we can praise Gromp better ;)
i have always showed my allegiance to santa baron
Baron.. Karen... to be honest who cares... I only pledge my allegiance to the one and only... Teemo...
